about_the_game:
The colonizer ship Genesis IV finds itself orbiting in the atmosphere of an unknown alien planet, after waking up from a cryogenic capsule, you find yourself lost and abandoned inside the gigantic ship, however, it is no longer the same spaceship you remember.

How long has it been? What happened to the crew? With your memory failing and your body frail, you'll have to explore and unravel the mysteries around the ship, plus any life you encounter will be hostile, your only companion: a lovely support droid, AIV, together you'll have to find a way to survive and escape the sealed ship.


* Craft items, equipment and weapons to defend against your enemies.
* Evolve your weapons, stats and equipment.
* Explore and solve the puzzles of the spaceship and the unknown alien world.
* Find out what went wrong with the Genesis IV exploration and colonization mission.
* Build your friendship with your support droid.


This game is being developed by GeemuStudios.
